channel.title: Compartment on TheKoguryo's Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Compartment on TheKoguryo's Tech Blog

item.title: 6.1 Compartment
item.description: 6.1 Compartment A compartment is a logical concept that makes it easy to manage resources, and you can think of it as a folder structure. When a Tenancy is created, one Root Compartment is created for the first time, and an administrator can add a new Compartment as a child of the Root Compartment. All OCI resources belong to a specific compartment, and users’ access policies can be managed in units of compartments.

item.title: 1.3 Compartment
item.description: 1.3 Compartment Compartments are a folder structure that makes it easy to manage resources. When a tenancy is created, the first Root Compartment is created, and administrators can add a new Compartment as a child of the Root Compartment. All OCI resources fall into a specific Compartment and can manage the access policies of their users in units of Compartment.
